Text: Sample will not play in WMP, MediaPlayer Classic, DivX Player, or Total Video player. Dr. DivX does not recognize it either.
However, the whole 700 Mb file plays well. Sound is good stereo and picture quality OK.

bleh, wrong link before.
corrected link: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0435670/

This release don't run in xbmc for me.  Neither does http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3809727. MPlayer reports an error just a few seconds in when I run it on my pc where it btw works. But xbox and xbmc don't seem to handle this error.
Sorry about my previous positive report. The sound tracking was bad in my standalone divX-dvd player, so I used dr. DivX on the file, and now synch is way off.
